        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()

        con is the connection to the database server.

      • doQuery

        public java.sql.ResultSet doQuery(java.lang.String query)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        used to create a result set of a preparedstatement to be executed in the database.
        Parameters:
        query - is the result set of the preparedstatement to be executed.
        Returns:
        rs is the result set executed from the preparedstatement.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if no connection can be made.
